description: It doesn't matter which city you go to, you can usually find a bar, pub, or club serving alcohol. And behind the bar, there is always a bartender. There are thousands of different courses you could take on mixing drinks. Most of them cost hundreds of dollars and offer a slow and ineffective training program. Stop wasting your time and money and start learning the right way to mix great drinks that will have your patrons asking for another round. Learn at your own pace, continue to refer back to the guide for help and you will find bartending has never been so easy. Learn the ins and outs of serving a highball, shot, martini, beer, or whisky, vodka, rum drink. Take the fast track to becoming an excellent bartender with the Bartending for Beginners ebook.
